title: Asking for Directions
description: Listen to people asking for and giving directions.

audio.text:
Tourist: Excuse me. I'm looking for the National Museum. Can you help me?
Local: Of course! It's not far from here. Do you know where City Hall is?
Tourist: Yes, I passed it on my way here.
Local: Great! So, from here, go straight for about two blocks. You'll see a big intersection with traffic lights.
Tourist: Okay, go straight for two blocks to the intersection.
Local: Right. At the intersection, turn left. Walk past the post office - it's on your right.
Tourist: Turn left, then pass the post office.
Local: Yes. After the post office, continue for one more block. The museum will be on your left. It's a large building with a modern design. You can't miss it.
Tourist: So it's on the left, after the post office?
Local: Exactly. It's about a 10-minute walk from here.
Tourist: Is it open today? Do you know?
Local: I think it's open every day except Monday. And today is Wednesday, so you should be fine.
Tourist: Thank you so much for your help!
Local: You're welcome. Enjoy your visit!
